atk-abh03a27:2_3: na nimittaggāhī hotī”ti suttaṁ nissāya “saṁvaropi asaṁvaropi kamma”nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a27:3_0: Atha naṁ yā sakasamaye cetanā “kamma”nti vuttā yathā sā kāyavacīmanodvāresu pavattamānā kāyakammādināmaṁ labhati,
atk-abh03a27:3_2: sopi cakkhundriyādīsu pavattamāno cakkhukammādināmaṁ labheyyā”ti codetuṁ cakkhundriyasaṁvaro cakkhukammantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a27:3_3: Itaro tādisaṁ suttapadaṁ apassanto catūsu dvāresu paṭikkhipitvā pañcame kāyadvāre pasādakāyaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a27:3_5: So hi pasādakāyampi viññattikāyampi kāyindriyantveva icchati.
atk-abh03a27:3_9: “Cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā”ti suttaṁ tesu dvāresu saṁvarāsaṁvarameva dīpeti,
atk-abh03a27:6_4: sañcetanikānaṁ kammāna”nti suttapadaṁ nissāya “sabbaṁ kammaṁ savipāka”nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a27:6_8: kammaṁ vadāmī”ti satthārā avisesena cetanā “kamma”nti vuttā;
atk-abh03a27:6_10: abyākatā avipākāti imaṁ vibhāgaṁ dassetuṁ sabbaṁ kammanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a27:6_12: Puna sabbā cetanāti pañhesu abyākataṁ sandhāya paṭikkhepo,
atk-abh03a27:6_16: bhikkhave”ti suttaṁ sati paccaye diṭṭhadhammādīsu vipākapaṭisaṁvedanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ,
atk-abh03a27:9_2: Tattha “so tassa kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā brahmassaro hotī”tiādīni ayoniso gahetvā “saddo vipāko”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a27:9_5: Rūpadhammesu panāyaṁ vohāro natthī”ti dassetuṁ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a27:9_7: Sukhavedanīyotiādi “vipāko nāma evarūpo hotī”ti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a27:9_9: Mahāpuriso hi kammassa katattā suciparivāropi hoti,
atk-abh03a27:12_2: Tattha yasmā saḷāyatanaṁ kammassa katattā uppannaṁ,
atk-abh03a27:12_5: te sandhāya cakkhāyatanaṁ vipākoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a27:12_8: Saḷāyatanaṁ vipākoti ettha manāyatanaṁ siyā vipāko.
atk-abh03a27:15_3: tasmā “sattakkhattuparamo puggalo sattakkhattuparamatāya niyato”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a27:15_5: tesaṁ ṭhapetvā “ariyamaggaṁ añño tassa niyamo natthi,
atk-abh03a27:15_6: yena so sattakkhattuparamatāya niyato bhaveyyā”ti imaṁ vibhāgaṁ dassetuṁ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a27:16_1: dve niyāmā sammattaniyāmo ca micchattaniyāmo ca.
atk-abh03a27:16_6: Tattha sattakkhattuparamo sotāpattimaggena avinipātadhammatāya ca phaluppattiyā ca niyamito.
atk-abh03a27:17_0: Abhabbo antarāti pañhesu ānantariyābhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a27:17_2: Atthi so niyāmoti pañhe sattakkhattuparamatāya niyāmaṁ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a27:17_3: Atthi te satipaṭṭhānātiādi niyāmasaṅkhāte maggadhamme dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a27:17_4: Tassa pana puna paṭhamamaggānuppattito tepi natthi,
atk-abh03a27:17_7: Nanu so sattakkhattuparamoti ettha bhagavā “ayaṁ puggalo ettake bhave sandhāvitvā parinibbāyissati,
atk-abh03a27:17_9: na bhavaniyāmaṁ nāma kiñci tena sattakkhattuparamo,
atk-abh03a27:22_2: Tattha yasmā dosasampayuttena cittena pāṇātipāto hoti,
atk-abh03a27:22_4: tasmā “diṭṭhisampanno sañcicca pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropeyyā”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a27:22_8: Sañcicca mātarantiādipañhesu pana “aṭṭhānametaṁ anavakāso”ti suttabhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a27:22_9: Satthari agāravotiādi satthārādīsu sagāravassa sikkhāpadassa vītikkamābhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a27:22_10: Itaro pana akusalavasena tassa agāravo nāma natthīti paṭikkhipitvā sagāravabhāvañca sampaṭicchitvā puna
atk-abh03a27:22_11: agāravoti puṭṭho tesu tesu kiccesu pasutatāya vikkhittānaṁ asatiyā amanasikārena cetiye abhivādanapadakkhiṇakaraṇābhāvaṁ
atk-abh03a27:22_13: Puna ohadeyyātiādinā nayena puṭṭho tādisāya kiriyāya sañcicca akaraṇato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a27:25_2: Tattha ye duggatiñca duggatisattānaṁ rūpādiārammaṇaṁ taṇhañcāti ubhayampi duggatīti gahetvā puna tathā
atk-abh03a27:25_7: Āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyātiādi paravādino laddhiyā diṭṭhisampannassa duggati appahīnā,
atk-abh03a27:25_10: Nirayaṁ upapajjeyyātiādi duggatipahānameva duggatigāminitaṇhāpahānaṁ vā dīpeti,
